etymology.description: Feet pointing downwards -> depiction of descending
etymology.interpretation: The character 夅(夅) (jiàng, "descend") visually represents feet and legs pointing downwards, symbolizing the action of descending. It creatively captures the concept of moving downwards using a simple pictorial form.

examples.chinese: 夕阳夅(夕陽夅)，西山影长(西山影長)。
examples.english: The setting sun descends, and the western mountains cast long shadows.
